post.summary: Make a booking for a given hotel
Fetch hotels with price based on given criteria

get.summary: Fetch result of a search request

parameters.name: price_details
parameters.description: if enabled, price details with breakdown options are provided in the response.

200.description: Listing result for the request gets returned with each hotel showing the best deal available

get.summary: Fetch deals from a specific hotel for a search request.

200.description: Show all the deals available under a hotel identified by hotel code

get.summary: List properties in a given destination.

200.description: Show properties under a destination by a given destination code.

404.description: Destination not found, make sure destination code is correct.

get.summary: Fetch details of a hotel in a destination by hotel code.

userEmail.description: [Required] HBT User email account to link the booking/request

requestRef.description: [Optional] A Unique reference ID to tag the request

childAges.description: Children ages at the time of check-in date

mealTypeCode.description: Preferred meal type code, example BB, HB, FB, AI

vacationTypeCode.description: Vacation type code to describe the purpose of the trip such as honeymoon

MakeBookingRequest.description: Make a booking based on a given criteria.

HotelPriceSearchResponse.description: Response provide the url to fetch the result using the requestID.

HotelBasicPriceSearchListingResultRespon.description: HotelPriceSearchResponse object returned for price search request

responseToken.description: The token issued by the system to fetch the result for a request

description: Domestic + Speed boat Transfers on 2020-01-04 for 2 adults and 2 children
Domestic + Speed boat Transfers on 2020-01-18 for 2 adults 2 and children

HotelPriceDetail.description: HotelPriceDetail object returned with all the packages generated for all accommodation options available

responseToken.description: The token issued by the system to fetch the result for a request

link.description: Link to fetch all the available deals under the hotel

url.description: Full API url with request token to fetch the hotel deals

description.example: 30% of the total amount for accommodation is chargeable if cancelled after confirming this booking

discount.description: discount amount if any discount was applied.

HotelPriceSearchListingResultResponse.description: HotelPriceSearchResponse object returned for price search request

responseToken.description: The token issued by the system to fetch the result for a request

description: Deluxe Beach Villa from 2020-07-04 to 2020-07-14, for 10 nights

applicable.description: Indicates if advance deposit is required or not.

groups.description: List of pax groups. Each pax group would have multiple room types for which deals are given.

rooms.description: Array of rooms available for the pax group.

key.description: Unique key for the package. This key shall be used when booking.

accommodation.description: Details of accommodation under a package

transfer.description: Details of transfer under a package

others.description: An array of other items under a package

cancellationPolicies.description: An array of cancellation policies for a package.

currency.description: Currency code in which the price is given.

discount.description: Discounted amount for the deal, if any.

deals.description: Array of deals for the room.

primary.description: Indicates whether a primary guest or not.

age.description: If the guest is a child, returns age of the child.

id.description: The identification id of the pax group.

key.description: The identification key used to represent pax group.

totalPax.description: Total number of pax in the group.

numAdults.description: Total number of adults in the pax group.

numChildren.description: Total number of children in the pax group.

date.description: Date on which current cancellation policy object becomes active

amount.description: Chargeable amount under current cancellation policy

amountType.description: Chargeable amount type (either flat value or percentage) under current cancellation policy

applyOn.description: Value type to apply the chargeable amount percentage in case `{amountType: 'percentage'}`

active.description: Indicates if current cancellation policy is active

example.name: Year Round
description: If cancelled on or after Jun 8, 2020, 100% of the total amount is chargeable

destinationCode.description: Destination to which the service applies to.

numAdults.description: Number adults to which the service is booked for.

numChildren.description: Number of children to which the service is booked for.

FreeUpgradeObject.description: A *FreeUpgradeObject* represents an eligible free upgrade. Only one upgrade can be applied per item class.

example.name: Green Tax
description: Green Tax charge per pax per night from Jul 4, 2020 for 10 nights

destinationCode.description: Code of the destination of flight.

currencyCode.description: Currency in which the hotel is priced with.

checkInDate.description: Date of check-in into the hotel.

checkOutDate.description: Date of check-out from the hotel.

splitStay.description: Indicates whether or not the group is staying on split-stay basis.

splits.description: Optional details of split stay. Available only for split stay accommodations.

packages.description: Available packages for the accommodation option.

accommodation.description: Details of accommodation under a package

transfer.description: Details of transfer under a package

others.description: An array of other items under a package

price.description: Pricing details of a package with the breakdowns on accommodations, transfer and other charges.

discountAmount.description: Total amount of discount of a package.

accommodationTotalAmount.description: Total amount charged for accommodation under a package.

transferTotalAmount.description: Total amount charged for transfer under a package.

otherChargesTotalAmount.description: Total amount of other charges under a package.

cancellationPolicies.description: An array of cancellation policies for a package.

freeUpgrades.description: An array of free upgrades for a package.

extraBenefits.description: An array of extra benefits for a package.

example.title: Honeymoon benefits
description:
Fruit basket upon arrival
 A bottle of wine upon arrival in the villa
 30 minutes Spa massage per couple, per stay
 Romantic candle-lit dinner for the couple once during the stay
 In-villa floral bath (once during the stay)
 Special evening Turn-down service with bed decoration once during the stay
 Complimentary in-villa breakfast for the couple once during the stay
 Celebratory cake

example.name: Domestic Flight
description: Domestic Flight on 2020-08-10 for 2 adults, 1 children

ages.description: Children ages at the time of check-in date

PropertyAccommodationObject.description: Details of a room type in a property.

code.description: Identification code of the Room type.

numRooms.description: Number of rooms in the property.

numRestaurants.description: Number of restaurants in the property.

numBars.description: Number of bars in the property.

locationText.description: Summary of the location where the property is located at.

lastUpdated.description:
Timestamp the record of property has updated last. This can be used to track if a
property has changed since it has been fetched / cached.

mealPlans.description: Meal plan types of the property.

PropertyMealPlanObject.description: Details of a meal plan type of a property.

code.description: Identification code of the meal plan.

name.description: Name of the meal plan type.

PropertyTransferObject.description: Detail of a transfer type of a property.

code.description: Identification code of the transfer type.

lastUpdated.description: Last updated timestamp of the property.

example.name: Domestic Flight + Sea Plane
description: Domestic Flight + Speedboat Transfer on 2020-08-10 for 2 adults, 1 child

destinationCode.description: Destination to which the transfer applies to.

numPax.description: Number of pax to which transfer service is offered to.

private.description: Indicates whether or not the transfer is private.

api_auth.description: Use a global client_id / client_secret and your username / password combo to obtain a token

tags.name: search
tags.description: Endpoints to be consumed to search and fetch price of hotel(s) based on a given criteria.

tags.name: properties
tags.description: Endpoints to list and fetch details of properties.

tags.name: bookings
tags.description: Endpoints to be consumed to make & update bookings
